name: Post & Courier Clean & Simple
description:
Just the facts, ma'am.

Hides all header, footer, ads, sidebar, and social data on Evening Post Industries sites:

Aiken Standard, Berkeley Independent, Columbia Free Times, Goose Creek Gazette, Kingstree News, Moultrie News, North Augusta Star, Charleston Post & Courier, South Strand News, Summerville Journal Scene.
additional_info:
20180502 - updated to cover all Evening Post Industries publications
20171211 - updated to remove another new ad
20171201 - updated to remove a new inline ad that's started showing up
20170629 - updated to allow article text to display
20161031 - updated to work with redesigned website
